name: Daily Bollinger–RSI Mean Reversion on Large-Cap Equities
description: Mean-reverting equity strategy that trades highly-liquid S&P-500 stocks on daily data. Buys when price is below the lower Bollinger Band (20,2) and RSI-14 is <30, sells/shorts when above the upper band and RSI-14 >70. Exits at mid-band or neutral RSI zone. Risk is controlled with 1.5×ATR(20) stops and 2.25×ATR(20) profit targets, giving a 1:1.5 reward profile. Each trade uses 2 % of account equity.
